English: Looking for opponent! Anyone is okay.
Chinese: 徵求對戰對手中！　歡迎所有人
徵求對戰對手中！　歡迎新手

English: Looking for opponent! Let's throw down.
Chinese: 徵求對戰對手中！　來認真比試吧

English: Let's end it with the next one.

Chinese: 以無限制規則進行對戰

English: Fight with No Restriction Level Setting.
Chinese: 以等級限制「無限制」進行對戰
以等級設定「平等50級」進行對戰

English: Fight with No Restriction Memory Setting.
Chinese: 以隊伍上限「無限制」進行對戰
以隊伍上限「100以內」進行對戰
以「使用」強化值進行對戰
以「不使用」強化值進行對戰

English: Can you change the party used?
Chinese: 能拜託你變更使用隊伍嗎？

English: I have something to do, see ya later.
German: Ich habe etwas zu tun. Bis dann.

English: I will change the party to use.
I'll fight with my favorite Digimon.
Chinese: 用喜歡的數碼寶貝來戰鬥

German: Du bist ziemlich hart im Nehmen!

English: I'll bring the pain next time!
